meanings.definition: A poisonous alkaloid found in nightshade plants.
meanings.sent1: The solanine in the nightshade plant can be harmful if ingested.
meanings.sent2: Some people avoid eating green potatoes due to the presence of solanine.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally added solanine to my salad instead of salt, and it tasted terrible!
meanings.sent4: The solanine in the nightshade plant is like a hidden danger waiting to strike.
meanings.sent5: The bright red berries of the plant contained solanine, a deadly poison.

meanings.definition: The toxic compound responsible for the bitter taste in certain vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The bitter taste of the vegetable was due to the presence of solanine.
meanings.sent2: Cooking can sometimes reduce the levels of solanine in vegetables.
meanings.sent3: I tried to prank my friend by adding extra solanine to their soup, but they noticed the bitterness right away!
meanings.sent4: The solanine in the vegetable made it taste like chewing on a bitter pill.
meanings.sent5: The chef accidentally added solanine to the dish, turning it into a bitter disaster.
